column5: I'm looking to rent a cottage for a weekend in May or June for 4 people. I friend of mine suggested Honey Harbour. I've never fished or been there or anywhere on Geordan bay. I like the idea because it's reletively close to Hamilton but I supposed it can any anywhere else with in same distance. The cottage would have to be private and include a boat. Can anyone suggest a cottage/location?
You might want to go online and check out a cottage rental directory for Honey Harbour , funny thing , i just bought one not that far from there and looking forward to fishing the area this year .,
Might be tough to find a private rental with a boat.  Too much at stake for the owner.  Better to rent/insure from a marina
Try french river, great fishing with many places to stay.

Honey Harbour has lots of fishing opportunities. That time of year uou are looking at pickeral and pike. As for finding a private cottage WITH a boat, that's tough, reason being all the rocks in the area. Good luck.
If your looking at Gbay make sure there is water up to the dock. Water levels are crazy low.
